availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Francis (Christian/ caldwell co. farmer )

body.p: Christian County and Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of William Francis and Elizabeth T. Francis. Married to Sarah E. Pool Francis in Christian County, Kentucky, on December 20, 1849. Father of Letitia Francis, William Francis, and John Francis. Farmer in Christian County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 461A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 64.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, Film #001942963, p. 171.
Find A Grave, "James Harrison Francis (1830-1885)," Memorial #153096263, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/153096263 (accessed June 16, 2021).
